message:
AirTable is what Excel should've been by now, if there's still competition.
https://airtable.com/features
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: IMO, they are competing with Access not Excel.
Geish because it looks like Excel, people will think it's Excel.

Ahmad Abd-Elghany I hate when they announce projects as groundbreaking so early. It just raises expectations unfairly, and no matter how well the project is, people think it sucks because it doesn't match what they expected. The same thing happened with Diaspora. It was "The Facebook Killer" before they wrote a single line of code.
I wrote a long time ago about how this was one of Microsoft's mistakes 
http://www.amreldib.com/2008/09/raising-expectations.html
I think you should compare it with SharePoint list
